release.action: Initial version.
While a run is running on HiSeq, send the first base report when available.
Add a hiseq.deny file that contains all the run ids to not process.
Now save a file with the pid of aozan. Now send a mail with the lock error only when the lock pid no more exists.
Remove temporary files (design, hiseq_log_ directory).
Fix issue when zip design files.
Fix issue with pid checking of already running aozan process.
Aozan has now a log file name aozan.log.
Trace exception in log file.
Issue with pid of currently running instance of Aozan.
Now get the good Basecall_Stats_FLOWCELLID path even for RTA 1.10.36.
Now show in log the new disk usage and disk free at the end of sync step and demux step.
Demux space estimation.
Fix mail message when a run is discovered.
Don't show Aozan welcome message when there is nothing to do.
Change Eoulsan version dependency. Prevent errors with Casava design CSV file with comma in cell value.
Fix typo in mail message when the end of run is discovered.

Now use Eoulsan 1.2-SNAPSHOT as dependency. New Casava design check: 1) Allow the use of a sample in several lanes. 2) new error if a sample is used by more than one project. 3) new warning if a sample exists in more than one lane. 4) new warning with the list of line where is a sample (if the number of lanes >1). 5) new errors if a sample is defined several time by with not the same sequence index.
In demux step, add Casava design warnings to log and to the success mail send to users.
The default number of threads is now the number of available processors/cores.
